title: Hour 3 - Peter Schrager (12-04-19)

description:
Dan And The Danettes welcome NFL Network “Good Morning Football” co-host Peter Schrager. Thank you to today's sponsors: Geico = Visit Geico.com. In just 15 minutes you could save 15% or more on car insurance.   Rocket Mortgage = Visit Rocketmortgage.com/Dan. Push button, get mortgage.  Theragun = Eliviate pain with this percussive therapy device, use promo code dpshow10 to get 2 free attachments. Find out more at www.theragun.com/dpshow10 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
